thread.title: 10 states where you can buy the most home for $300,000

title: 10 states where you can buy the most home for $300,000
text:
10 states where you can buy the most home for $300,000 Jim R. Bounds | Bloomberg | Getty Images Lorie Konish | @LorieKonish 2 Hours Ago
If you're looking to get the most home for your money, you may want to reconsider where you're looking.
Personal finance website GOBankingRates took a look at how far your money can go using real estate website Zillow's home price index.
Here are the states where $300,000 will stretch the farthest. 10. Missouri
Median list price per square foot: $106.67
Total square feet for $300K: 2,812 Larry Braun | Larry Braun Photography | Getty Images 9. Kansas
Median list price per square foot: $105.94

Median list price per square foot: $105.80
Total square feet for $300K: 2,836 Jeff Greenberg | Photolibrary | Getty Images 7. Oklahoma
